thread.title: Linda Rowland
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Linda Rowland

author: Linda Rowland
title: Linda Rowland
text: I had to return a Barbour jacket I'd bought for a Xmas present that was too small. I emailed the company and got an immediate reply. Nothing was too much trouble. I will definitely use them again as well as recommending to family and friends. The pricing was also better than any other web site. Well done Country Attire!
